name: Eldegoss
specialText: When Eldegoss has been damaged over a certain value, cotton will burst, which will increase Eldegoss’ movement speed and regain some health.
basicAttack: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, which attaches cotton to the Pokémon. If you use a basic attack on a Pokémon with Cottom on, the damage will increase and the movement speed will be reduced

skills.name: Leafage
skills.effect: Pelts the target with leaves, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time when it hits.

skills.name: Pollen Puff
skills.effect: Throws a Pollen Puff, which attaches to a Pokemon. The Pollen Puff restores HP for ally Pokemon and deals damage to opposing Pokemon.
skills.upgrades: In addition, while a Pollen Puff is attached to them, opposing Pokemon receive damage over time and ally Pokemon receive less damage.

skills.name: Leaf Tornado
skills.effect: Attacks with a tornado of sharp leaves, leaving a path in its wake that increases ally Pokemon's movement speed for a short time.
skills.upgrades: Decreases the accuracy of opposing Pokemon when this move hits.

skills.name: Synthesis
skills.effect: Restores the HP of the user and nearby ally Pokemon.

skills.name: Cotton Guard
skills.effect: Protects the user and nearby ally Pokemon with cotton. The cotton absorbs damage, and when the move ends, the cotton restores some HP.
skills.upgrades: Increases the user's movement speed while using this move.

skills.name: Cotton Spore
skills.effect: Gathers spores around the user that reduce damage received. The spores burst after a short time, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect and decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time.
skills.upgrades: Also throws opposing Pokemon when this move hits.

skills.name: Cotton Cloud Crash
skills.effect: Eldegoss's Unite Move. Has the user float into the air and become invincible. If used again, has the user pound the ground, attacking and showing (knockback) opposing Pokemon and restoring HP to ally Pokemon in the area of effect.

changeLogs.changes: Added Passive Skill name and effect. Updated Moves section.
Added hyperlinks to each moves to for players to get a preview of the move's animation.
Added Mugshot and Model. Added Viability Stats. Updated Character Sheet arrangement.
Updated Role Name to reflect changes from 2021 Mar Canada Regional Beta Test.
Updated Difficulty Name, Move Names, Category, Evolution Level, and Move Descriptions, updated Ability description, and added Basic Attack to reflect changes from 2021 Mar Canada Regional Beta Test.
Added Unite Move Name to from the official website
Added Basic Attack Description based on the Japanese Network Test.
